moves.1. e3 e5 2. d4 e4 3. Nc3 d5: I tried to find what this opening was called and I found it as Irregular opening.
moves.9. Bb4: !! Winning a Rook early in the game. Cannot push c5 because of Bishop takes c5.
moves.9... Qe6 10. Bxf8 Kxf8 11. Nh3 b6 12. Ng: I wanted to move the f pawn out of the way so I can castle with my Rook having a good open file.
moves.19... g6 20. Bg4 c5 21. d5 h5 22. Bxd7 R: !! F pawn cannot take my Rook because it is pinned.
moves.25... Qf6 26. Re6: I like my Rook to be there.
moves.26... Qg5 27. h4 Qg4: Black see's the Queen takes h4 Rook takes g6.
moves.28. Rf4 Qg3 29. Qf2: I decided to trade Queens because I was up material.
moves.29... Qxf2+ 30. Kxf2 Kf7: To stop the Rook from taking g6.
He really had nothing else to do. If he wanted the game to go on longer he could keep checking me.
